title: Project Borders
body: I'd like to get the PROJECT : {{champion:55}}  Border but i didnt get that icon thingy when the event was going on. Will there be another time i can get that border? {{champion:55}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:55}}

replies.body: I'm not absolutely 100% sure right at the moment, but I'm fairly sure those icons were event exclusive which means you may not be able to get those anymore. There's a chance that they're still obtainable through hextech rewards, but I'm still waiting for confirmation on whether or not that's true.
Does that mean if i gotten the ashe,ekko and kata icon 1 year ago but lets say buy one of those skins tommorow that i eill have the border?
